name: Debashish Deb
title: Full-Stack Web Developer & Biotechnologist
about: I'm an aspiring Full-Stack Web Developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences.

projects.name: Cars-Viewer
projects.description: A Golang-based application to view and manage different types of cars and their features. Includes a RESTful API and a basic front-end.

projects.name: Match-Making App
projects.description: A JavaScript and Golang application to find the best match based on user preferences. Uses a matching algorithm and a simple UI.

projects.name: Stations-Pathfinder
projects.description: The Stations-Pathfinder helps calculate the best routes for multiple trains, ensuring no two trains end up at the same station at the same time. It works in turns, moving trains across a railway map you provide.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: My personal portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects.

experience.title: Delivery Assistant
responsibilities: Started the job as a delivery person, later got promoted as an assistant for the supervisor who assisted in solving different problems regarding job.

testimonials.text: Debashish is a highly motivated learner. His contributions to the project were invaluable, and he quickly adapted to new technologies.
testimonials.author: Heikki Kusäänmäki

testimonials.text: Debashish demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail. He was a valuable asset to the team.

aboutOptions: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer specializing in building and designing exceptional digital experiences. My passion lies in creating robust user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems. I'm proficient in a wide range of technologies, including JavaScript (ES6+), GoLang, HTML5, CSS3, React, and Node.js. My projects, such as the 'Cars-Viewer' (a Golang-based application with a RESTful API) and the 'Match-Making App' (built with JavaScript and Golang), demonstrate my ability to handle both front-end and back-end development. I enjoy the challenge of crafting intuitive user interfaces and building efficient, scalable server-side logic. I'm currently deepening my expertise through the Kood/Sisu full-stack web development program, and I'm always eager to learn new technologies and take on new challenges. My background in biotechnology (with a Master of Science degree from the University of Helsinki) has also instilled in me a strong analytical mindset and a meticulous approach to problem-solving, qualities that I bring to every project. My focus is on delivering high-quality, well-tested code that meets and exceeds expectations.
